description: This file is the entry point for a frontend web application that initializes a Lightning.js-based app, manages DOM fallbacks, and sets up event-driven UI updates.

methods.name: document.addEventListener
methods.description: Sets up an event listener for 'DOMContentLoaded' to initialize app setup procedures.

methods.name: window.addEventListener
methods.description: Sets up an event listener for application 'ready' notification to finalize UI adjustments.

methods.name: requestAnimationFrame
methods.description: Schedules a function to remove the fallback UI once the first animation frame is rendered.
